Package heuristics

Interface Heuristic

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    DavisHillClimbing, RandomReinsertion
    public interface Heuristic
    Interface to define the signature for non specific heuristics
    Author:
    Felix

      double applyHeuristic​(Solution currentSolution, double dos, double iom)

    • Method Detail

      • applyHeuristic

        double applyHeuristic​(Solution currentSolution,
                      double dos,
                      double iom)
        Method to apply the implemented heuristic to a given solution
        Parameters:
        currentSolution - The solution to apply the heuristic to
        dos - The depth of search parameter
        iom - The intensity of mutation parameter
        Returns:
        The fitness of the solution after having the Heuristic applied to it
